p:
Ants have differential effects on plant-pollinator interaction
12, 18– 25 . Though a few studies demonstrate ants’ engagement in pollination
25, 26 , ants have generally been regarded as a threat for plant-pollinator mutualism
19, 20, 23, 24, 27– 31 . There are a handful of studies exploring the impacts of invasive ants on pollinators, however, a comparison of invasive and native ants concerning their interaction with floral visitors are scarce
12 .
